comment: Hands down one of the greatest teachers I ever had the honor to study under.  I only wish he still taught, I would take any class he taught.  Not the easiest class, but he was helpful, insghtful with examples from his experience, and one of the most honorable men I have ever had the privalage to know.  If you get the chance take his class!
Wonderful class. Great professor. Kept class interesting with his experience. Would help you with whatever you needed. I hope he teaches 2200 because I would definately take again!!!
